trans-unit.source: Common options
Enable squeezr
Em-to-pixel conversion precision:Enter the smallest fraction you would like to be supported by the Em-to-pixel conversion
Client cache lifetime:Enter the total of seconds client browsers should cache resources (1 week = 604800 seconds)
Image engine
Disable image engine
Image breakpoints:Enter a comma separated list of breakpoint pixel values here
Enable the image engine
JPEG quality:Control the quality of JPEG images by giving a value between 1 and 100 (defaults to 80)
Image sharpening:Enable this option to slightly sharpen downsampled images
Force image sharpening:Enable this option to force sharpening in any case, even if it impacts image quality (GIF or 8-bit PNG images)
Copy undersized images:Enable this option to let squeezr make copies of undersized images in case your system doesn't support symlinks
PNG image quantizer:Select the quantizer to use for downsampling 8-bit PNG images (all options but "internal" are third party tools that have to be installed on the server independently)
PNG quantizer speed:Control the quantizer speed (and quality) by giving a speed factor between 1 (slow, max. quality) and 10 (fast, rough)
CSS engine
Enable the CSS engine
Minify CSS
Disable CSS engine
Update squeezr cache
The squeezr configuration has successfully been updated.
